message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $20,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $16,000?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $16,000 is too low for me. How about we settle at $18,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, could we discuss a price closer to $17,000?
